mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.attr_name,t1.category_id,t2.id v_id,t2.value_name,t2.attr_id FROM base_attr_info t1 LEFT JOIN base_attr_value t2 ON t1.id = t2.attr_id WHERE t1.category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT t1.id, t1.attr_name, t1.category_id, t2.id v_id, t2.value_name, t2.attr_id FROM base_attr_info t1 INNER JOIN base_attr_value t2 ON t1.id = t2.attr_id INNER JOIN sku_attr_value t3 ON t1.id = t3.attr_id AND t2.id = t3.value_id WHERE t3.sku_id = #{skuId}
